title: Sword Art Online Fatal Bullet: The Third Episode
synopsis: The short follows a boy looking for a girl he met in the Gun Gale Online game. The boy believes they have a connection, but to the girl their connection is part of a fantasy. The time to test whether their bond is real or fantasy will come.
